entry.title: IN EFFECT, Beaverlodge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:00 PM MDT Wednesday 01 December 0

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beaverlodge 05:00 AM MDT Saturday 28 May 2016
Temperature: 4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: 2.6°C
Wind: WNW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 13.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High 13. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Saturday 28 May 2016

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3 with risk of frost. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Low plus 3 with risk of frost. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Saturday 28 May 2016
